info.name: Firefox Icon App Menu
info.description: Changes the "Firefox" label on the App Menu to the Firefox icon and removes extra padding from the App Menu button.
info.additionalInfo: I found this style in the comment section of the "Tabs Always In Titlebar" add-on (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/tabs-always-in-titlebar/) posted by dnak (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/user/5550660/).  I wanted make it easier to share with people so I made this user style to send to people.  It goes really well with that addon so you should check it out!

data.title: big app icon appeared small and cropped
